column2: ENGLISH
Giving a Helping Hand

Day after day, night after night, you cannot help but notice that your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] appears to be finding the burdens of life too much to handle. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] often wakes up at night in cold sweat, or weeps inconsolably when [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] thinks nobody is watching. You feel that you need to help somehow.
Perhaps a wild ride shall give [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] something to look forward to every night?
Your prowess in bed shall distract [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] from [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] troubles!
Your prowess in bed was found wanting...
A great feast to show everyone's gratitude to [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] shall suffice!
The feast impresses your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].
The feast is merely ignored by your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].
A few days out in the wilds always helped to sort out one's thoughts...
The tranquility of the wilds manages to help your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].
Something unexpected happens and prevents the trip.
My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] could use some soothing words.
Your words help to soothe your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]'s mind.
Your words fail to do anything for your [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]'s mind.
I dare not make [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] thoughts any darker...
You decide to do nothing at this time.

An ambush with a bed covered with perfumed roses proved the greatest of solutions for my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]'s problems! After making love until the wee hours of the morning, [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] returned to court with a broad smile on [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] face.
Now if only I could walk straight today...
An ambush with a bed of perfumed roses did not work as well as I thought it would. My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] remains unimpressed, falling asleep after pushing aside the roses...
And I walked away unsatisfied. How vexing!

A small feast I held with all the courtiers in attendance proved to be what my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] needed. Their declarations of gratitude reminded [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] of all the good that [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] has done for the realm.
[Root.Spouse.GetHerHisCap]'s smile outshines the Sun!

A small feast I held with all the courtiers in attendance merely irritated my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]. [Root.Spouse.GetSheHeCap] declared that it reminded [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] of just another day in court!
The courtiers are also offended, but at least I smoothed it over...

After a few days that we have stayed in the solitude of a private hunting camp, my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] approaches me with a smile on [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] face. Apparently, the serenity of the wilderness has helped [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim] to collect [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] thoughts!
Now if only I could get rid of the grass stains on my clothes so easily...

We had planned to go on a private hunting trip, but it seemed that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] had other plans. Vicious thunderstorms struck, ensuring that we would not be able to leave. In the end, my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] states that [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] cannot leave [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] tasks alone any longer...
And I was looking forward to it as well...

A session of grooming my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] before bed, while speaking at length about [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] problems, has borne fruit. After voicing [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] problems last night, [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] appears to be much happier now.
Excellent.

Whatever honeyed words that I had prepared sounded hollow and meaningless last night. Though my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] listened to everything I had to say, there appears to be no difference in [Root.Spouse.GetHerHis] mood...
What more do I need to say...?
Receiving a Helping Hand

As I changed into my underthings at night, I turned around to find my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] on my bed, with a veritable multitude of roses surrounding [Root.Spouse.GetHerHim]! By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], the things we did that night...
I may not be able to walk straight, but my mind feels much better now!

After a long day at court, the last thing I wanted was another task to do. My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] was on my bed at night, demanding my attention. By [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], can I not have a moment of the day to myself!?
Alas, [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] could not be dissuaded. I feel exhausted.

I received an invitation to a feast that I did not recall organising in my own halls. As I entered the great hall, I came face to face with the beaming faces of all my courtiers! My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] approaches me with a broad smile, saying that they wish to thank me for all I have done for the realm!
And this is exactly why I must continue with what I do!
I received an invitation to a feast that I did not recall organising in my own halls. Another feast, another gathering of courtiers...can I never be free of their demands?
Leave me alone!

My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] invited me to a private hunting trip. This has turned out to be a blessing in disguise, as while I am away from my courtiers, I find myself finally able to gather my thoughts!
I owe my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] my thanks for this gift!
My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] invited me to a private hunting trip. The weather, however, proved completely hostile, only clearing up just as I was needed back in my court...
Even [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] seems against it...

A bottle of scented oil and a warm bath greeted me as I returned to my chambers. My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] offered to listen to my problems as [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] gently tended to my body. Though it seems foolish, I find myself with fewer dark thoughts running about in my head afterwards.
[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] is truly a dedicated [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife].

A bottle of scented oil and a warm bath greeted me as I returned to my chambers. My [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] offered to listen to my problems as [Root.Spouse.GetSheHe] gently tended to my body. Though I appreciated the gesture, the dark thoughts in my head remains unchanged.
Another day, another farmer and his pig to listen to...
